EmailTemplate.name: Docusign Signature Reminder to MP - Final Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Notice: Diagnosis Verification Signature Not Captured
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!dsfs__DocuSign_Recipient_Status__c.DV_Form_Name__c}
Oops! It looks like you completed the Diagnosis Verification form for {!dsfs__DocuSign_Recipient_Status__c.Lead_Name__c}, but your signature was not captured. In order to move forward in the process, your signature is required.
Password {!dsfs__DocuSign_Recipient_Status__c.DV_Form_Password__c} Link: Diagnosis Verification
To sign and submit this Diagnosis Verification form, please use the provided password and link. Scroll to the bottom of the form to click SAVE & NEXT, which will take you to DocuSign for signature. Follow the DocuSign prompts to add your signature and click Finish.
Thank you for your assistance! Your time and support are appreciated.
Sincerely,
